Package edu.nyu.cs.cs101.consumers_v1

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Colorable
    The colorable interface guarantees that an object will have color related attributes that can be accessed using the following getter/setter methods.
    Expandable
    Some objects can grow or shrink at a specific rate.
    ProcessingUI
    Classes that implement this are agreeing to implement several processing related functions that include all the necessary functionality for drawing it to the screen using the processing framework (http://processing.org).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ball
    Ball class stores data associated with a ball and functions that access or manipulate that data.
    ConsumingBall
    A ConsumingBall is a Ball that is always accelerating in the direction towards the closest ball.
    ControllableBall
    A Ball that can accelerate in a specific direction.
    Driver
    This is a simple game.
    EvadingBall
    An EvadignBall is a Ball that is always trying to move in the direction away from the closest ball.
    ExpandableBall
    A Ball that can grow or shrink in size.
    IntelligentBall
    An intelligent ball is a Ball that: Tries to accelerate towards smaller balls that are near it (to consume them) Tries to accelerate away from larger balls that are near it (to evade them) How you implement your algorithm is up to you.
    Shape
    Base class for shape classes.
